name: Cruelty Free Europe
goal: Cruelty Free Europe is a new organisation campaigning to bring animal experiments to an end across the European Union. We work with elected Members of the European Parliament, the Commission and supporters in all Member States, to coordinate efforts to secure change for the over 11 million animals currently suffering in laboratories in Europe.  We campaign for Europe to take the lead in the development of humane, modern science and progressive legislation.
interests: Consumers, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and innovation, Trade
euInitiatives: All legislation and policies with an impact on animals in laboratories, including REACH and the Cosmetics Regulation and Animals in Science legislation as well as the funding of research and development initiatives and the every day work of agencies like ECHA.
